senses.sense_definition: Describing an atom, bond, or group of atoms that is situated outside of a ring structure in a chemical compound, typically attached to the ring but not forming part of the ring itself.

examples.text: The presence of an <w>exocyclic</w> double bond significantly alters the stability of the molecule.
Chemists focused on modifying the <w>exocyclic</w> amino group to improve the drug's efficacy.
